text: Jönköpings idrottshus, nicknamed Kåken, is a sports hall in Väster in the town of Jönköping in Sweden. It was opened on 19 November 1939 with a handball game between GoIF Fram and IFK Kristianstad.GoIF Fram - Lite historik It also acts as home ground for club teams like Jönköping City IBK (floorball), IK Cyrus T/S, IF Hallby (handball), Jönköpings IK (floorball) and KFUM Jönköping. Following criticism for being "too old" by the early 2000s, it was renovated and reopened on 8 September 2012. ==References== Category:1939 establishments in Sweden Category:Indoor arenas Category:Sport in Jönköping Category:Buildings and structures in Jönköping
title: Jönköpings idrottshus
